word_mean: 氯：黄绿色气体元素，具窒息性臭味
比重1.56。为消毒剂、脱色剂、刺激性毒物，以其水溶液或漂白粉形式用于消毒、熏烟及漂白

sentence.Network_en: Since 1908, chlorine has been added to drinking water.
sentence.Network_cn: 自1908年以来氯就被添加进饮用水当中。

sentence.Network_en: Chlorine is used to disinfect water.
Chlorine is added to kill bacteria.

derivation.yuyuan_name: early 19th cent.: named by Sir Humphrey Davy, from Greek khlōros 'green' + -ine

entry.def: Chlorine is a strong-smelling gas that is used to clean water and to make cleaning products.

means.word_mean: 1. a common nonmetallic element belonging to the halogens; best known as a heavy yellow irritating toxic gas; used to purify water and as a bleaching agent and disinfectant; occurs naturally only as a salt (as in sea water)
